author: Suparna Chaudhry, Shubha Kamala Prasad
title: How India plans to put 1.3 billion people on a coronavirus lockdown
description: Can India get that many people to stay home?
content:
Heres what you need to know about Indias preparedness for weathering this pandemic, and the potential effects of the government lockdown.
1. What is Indias covid-19 situation?
